SELECT user.user_id, user.user_name, role.role_id, role.role_name, role.role_code, role.role_desc, role.role_valid FROM sys_user AS user , sys_user_role AS userRole , sys_role AS role WHERE user.user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND user.user_id = userRole.user_id AND userRole.role_id = role.role_id
